column4: Anyone got ubuntu to get updates through a MS ISA Server Web Proxy?
Anyone got ubuntu to get updates through an authenticating MS ISA Server Web Proxy?  If so... please tell me how :S
please stop repeating the same question. If someone knows, (s)he will answer. You can try posting on the mailing list too.
sorry, was trying to be a bit more explicit second time round so people wouldn't just reply "yes" or "no"...
